metadata.title: 8' X 10' Faux Fur Throw Rug/True White Shaggy Fake Fur/Sheepskin Accent Rug/Area Throw/New
features: Hand Crafted, Faux Fur Shag, 8 foot x 10 foot Rectangular Area Rug, Top Quality Fur, Hand Cut and Sewn in America

The Perfect Blend of Modern Acrylics and Polyester, Lightweight, Soft to the Touch, Natural Wool or Cotton Like Appearance, Exceptionally Durable, Colorfast and Texture Enhanced. Lined with Color Coordinated, Soft, Bonded Ultra Suede

Easy Care and Cleaning, For Small Spills and Stains, Spot Clean with a New Rag or Sponge, Use Warm Water and a Mild Detergent. Rub, Pat and Blot Until Clean, Then Allow to Air Dry. Shake Between Cleanings and Use a Hose Attachment to Vacuum When Needed. Due to Size We Recommend Professional Care, Dry Clean or Cold Water Wash, Gentle Cycle, No Bleach, Harsh Chemical Cleaners or Fabric Softeners, Air Dry Using No Heat, Lay Flat or Hang Until Dry, Then Simply Shake and Toss
Balancing Beauty and Functionality, Natural and Neutral White Blends Perfectly with Any Décor or Decorating Style
8 feet by 10 feet Rectangular and Approximately 2 inches thick. Can be Raked, Brushed or Shaken to Restore Fluffiness and Fullness
description: In Response to Public Demand For a Realistic, High Quality Alternative to Real Animal Fur, Fur Accents has Created this Large, Sumptuous Shag, Faux Sheepskin Carpet, 8 Feet by 10 feet Rectangular, Roomsized Rug. Hand Cut and Sewn, it's Individually Packed and Shipped by Fur Accents USA From the Beginning of Time, Fur Has Been a Coveted and Staple Material Used in Fashion and Home Décor. However, Good Stewardship and Modern Environmentalism Have Moved Us Away from Killing Animals for Their Skins. The Great News is, Today's Modern Technology is Helping Protect Our Animals and Keeping Tradition Alive. Fur Accents Bonded Faux Fur is a Soft, Natural, Fur Substitute. This Functional Rug, From the Fur Accents Art Rug Collection is an Original Creation, not Imported Like Most of the Rugs for Sale on the Internet. It is Made with Beautiful, High Quality Materials by Skilled Craftsmen. It is Lined with a Soft Micro Suede Backing Which Inhibits Slippage, Reduces Shedding and Protects Your Floors. Sure to Start Many Conversations and Bring Much Pleasure and Enjoyment, Our High Quality Faux Fur is 80% Premium Acrylic and 20% Polyester Fiber, Woven Together into a Soft Flexible Back, Giving the Look and Feel of a Real Animal Shag Rug
Superior Color Properties Provide Richer, Brighter, More Natural Colors
This Rug can be The Focal Point in Your Room. Measure Your Space Before Ordering, There is a Small Restock Charge for All Approved Returns
Machine Washable in Cold Water and Air Dry, No Heat
Superior Shape Retention and Fade Resistance Means Your Rug Should Last Longer and Look Better Even After Cleaning
